attributes.action: Withdraw British Troops from Iraq and Afghanistan immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That this inept Government withdraws British Troops from Iraq and Afghanistan with immediate effect as they have shown themselves to be unable to provide adequate equipment, adequate medical facilities and appropriate logistical support to those in theatre.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
